Activity: Check emails and respond to any queries from QA. Review performance metrics from the latest build.
Identify performance bottlenecks in the game. Use profiling tools to analyze frame rates and memory usage.
Optimize code for critical areas identified, such as rendering and physics calculations.
Fix critical bugs reported by QA. Prioritize crashes and game-breaking issues.
Email @beng-1 to discuss build optimizations and potential improvements for the next build.
Test fixes in the development environment and verify that performance improvements are effective.
